      class TransformPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • focus
          Rectangle focus
          The bounding box of the focused object of this panel; the center of scale and rotation is the center of the box.
        • isRotating
          boolean isRotating
        • prevMouseX
          int prevMouseX
        • prevMouseY
          int prevMouseY
        • rotate
          double rotate
          The current (net) amount of rotation, in radians.
        • scale
          double scale
          The current (net) amount of scale.
        • translateX
          double translateX
          The current (net) amount of translation on the x-axis in double precision.
        • translateY
          double translateY
          The current (net) amount of translation on the y-axis in double precision.
